profiles.name: nextcloud-pi
profiles.commandline: powershell.exe -c "while ($true) { wsl -d Debian ssh pi@nextcloud-pi; Start-Sleep -Seconds 0.5 }"

profiles.name: internet-pi
profiles.commandline: powershell.exe -c "while ($true) { wsl -d Debian ssh pi@internet-pi; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1 }"

profiles.name: octoprint
profiles.commandline: powershell.exe -c "while ($true) { wsl -d Debian ssh -p 69 soongjr@octoprint; Start-Sleep -Seconds 0.5 }"
